reviews.review: Amazing game. Insanely fun. Looks amazing for an 11 year old game, and has realy creative storyline. If you have a friend who has this game, it's insane fun.

If you thought Portal 1 was good, you would be blown away of how good Portal 2 is. Rich environmental story telling, with some of the most recognizable, best, and funniest characters in gaming. Buy this game!

If Portal 1 was already unique for his time, Portal 2 was a new step further.
The introduction of the co-op campain was unique. The story starts were Portal 1 ends and with this game you end up understanding Aperture and his relation to the Half Life universe (Black Mesa). Contains humor and all the usual challenges related to the tests.
Overall, for a game that came out in 2011 it is still top of the line in 2022.
Great game. Great soundtrack. Great puzzles. Great Atmosphere. Excellent Voice acting.

Buen dia a todos! Les dejo mi rese√±a sobre este juego, me centre en la trama principal en solitario y no probre expasiones, dise√±o de niveles o algun otro aspecto :D

Jugabilidad: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
Una vez mas una excelente entrega, tiene mecanicas nuevas y no se siente como una expansion del primer portal en lo absoluto, aun jugando el primer juego habra acertijos que te cuesten algo de tiempo, no lo recomiendo si no tienes paciencia o si no te gustan los puzzles

Historia: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Si bien la primera entrega de portal no contaba con mucha historia esta entrega le dio mas toques al universo explicando unas cuantas cosas mas y la trama del juego captura bastante bien la atencion

Time to beat: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ
Dado que es un juego con mecanicas de acertijos me parce que la duracion promedio de terminarlo (6 Hrs) es bastante aceptable, ni muy poco como la primera entrega ni demasiado para abrumar a un jugador, puede que estuviera mejor con unos cuantos acertijos mas

Escenarios: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Excelente calidad de escenarios muy amplios y a comparacion de la entrega anterior, mas variados, sin embargo queda este toque de resentimiento al no ver algun escenario mas verde dado que en algun punto las instalaciones estan a merced de la naturaleza
Gained brain cells after playing this..

Story so good and engaging finished the game in one sitting in 5.4 hours. However if you dont rush you can get 7-8 hours of just story mode which is a great mind-boggling gigantic world with you in a pickle or two. Worth all the money especially on summer sale.
Even better than the first game. Narration is funny and puzzles are challenging. Probably one of the best game sequels.

It's a fascinating game with loveable characters and an engaging story. The puzzles are of similar difficulty as they were in the first game, but that doesn't make them any less enjoyable. The co-op is also remarkably satisfying. Primarily because of the unique levels and the need to cooperate with your friend. Also, who could forget about GLaDOS mocking you once again. The only thing missing, in my opinion, is the style of challenge levels from the first Portal. But this is outweighed by the story, co-op and community modifications like Portal Reloaded. Overall, I enjoyed Portal 2 so much that I'll have to replay it sometime in future.

Classic game. Good puzzles. Good Story. Awesome.

The #1 game I've played period.

Absolutely amazing story, puzzles, characters, and everything. I first played Portal 2 before I was in grade 6, and yet it's still the one game I can come back to every few months and replay and STILL find something new and charming about it.

I seriously cannot praise this game enough. Especially given that it's like $2 most days with steam sales. And while you're at it, get the original so you can have the full experience.
